thread.title: Trump sends Uncle Sam on a borrowing spree

title: Trump sends Uncle Sam on a borrowing spree
text:
Trump sends Uncle Sam on a borrowing spree 3:03pm GMT - 01:53 
The U.S. Treasury is set to complete Thursday the second-largest debt sale over a three-day period in borrowing history as it looks to fund President Trump's tax overhaul and budget deal. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. Treasury is set to complete Thursday the second-largest debt sale over a three-day period in borrowing history as it looks to fund President Trump's tax overhaul and budget deal.
